Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
btw webworker mad this to do it for you:
```magic=$(echo $magic | sed 's/magic.//')
    magicrev=""
    for((i=0;i<=${#magic};i+=2)); do
        magicrev="${magic:i:2}$magicrev"
done```
